Package game.grounds.spawning

Class Environment

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.grounds.spawning.Environment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Graveyard, GustOfWind, PuddleOfWater
public abstract class Environment extends Ground
Environment class is a base class that provides common attributes and methods for generic terrain in the game.
Version:
2.1
Author:
Chew Xin Ning 32693974 Modified by: Ng Yu Mei 32423454, Foo Kai Yan 33085625

  • Constructor Details

    • Environment

      public Environment(String name, char displayChar, int eastSpawnChance, int westSpawnChance, int despawnChance)
      Constructor for Environment.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the environment
      displayChar - character to display for this type of environment
      eastSpawnChance - The chance for the creature to be spawned from the environment on the east
      westSpawnChance - The chance for the creature to be spawned from the environment on the west
      despawnChance - The chance for the creature to be despawned from the environment
